item.title: Anna add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't remember what happened. What you remember becomes what happened." -- John Green

item.title: Anna add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "There must be something in books, something we can’t imagine, to make a woman stay in a burning house; there must be something there. You don’t stay for nothing." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Anna add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
Anna add a quote by John Green
item.description: "There's some people in this world who you can just love and love and love no matter what." -- John Green

item.title: Anna add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "We are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. The trick is, knowing how to tip ourselves over and let the beautiful stuff out." -- Ray Bradbury
